name: Catpire!
description:
A vampire cat!?!?!
Yes, it's a 2d metroidvania game about a cute vampire cat who kills evil bats and consume his enemies blood, have fun :)

- Controls:

  • Move: Left and Right arrow keys
  • Jump: Z
  • Wall Jump: Move towards the wall and press Z
  • Melee Attack: X
  • Vertical Melee Attack: X when holding the Up or Down arrow keys.
  • Dash: C
  • Unleash Blood: S
